trans-unit.source: Provides a visual editor for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> fields.
trans-unit.target: 提供 visual 编辑器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref>字段。

trans-unit.source: The DataPagerFieldTypeEditor class provides a visual editor that is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DataPagerFieldTypeEditor 类提供内部使用的可视编辑器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor"></xref> class.

Displays the visual editor by using the style that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle*> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指示的样式来显示 visual 编辑器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>方法来更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Context information about the design environment.
trans-unit.target: 有关设计环境的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the associated designer.
trans-unit.target: 对关联的设计器的引用。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
Gets the style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: 获取编辑器将使用的样式。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the editor style that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method and will always return `UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指示使用的编辑器样式<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法并将始终返回`UITypeEditorEditStyle.Modal`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerFieldTypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Context information about the design environment.
trans-unit.target: 有关设计环境的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the type of style that the editor will use.
trans-unit.target: 指示的编辑器将使用的样式的类型的枚举值之一。
